violations.compliance_concern: DNS records are not secured with SSL/TLS encryption.
violations.remediation: Apply SSL/TLS encryption to DNS records.

violations.compliance_concern: Outbound traffic to the internet is not restricted.
violations.remediation: Restrict outbound traffic to specific trusted IP ranges or CIDR blocks.

violations.compliance_concern: Bucket access is not logged and monitored.
violations.remediation: Configure CloudTrail to log and monitor bucket activity.

recommendations: Limit the number of IAM roles with broad permissions.
Apply least privilege principle to all AWS resources.
Enable MFA on root accounts and critical IAM users.
Regularly review access key rotations and revoke unused keys.
